channel.title: Need help with run&compile
channel.description:
ok, when I run and compile i get an error.I think it has something to do with my classpath..im not sure though.
the error says..
'Compiler' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect. The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect. Starting WhiteScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

item.title: Need help with run&compile
item.dc:creator: @g0d_0f_war g0d 0f war
item.description:
@g0d_0f_war wrote:

ok, but when i try to log on it says “invalid loginserver requested, please try a different world.”. i have tried many screennames[br][size=1]Posted at: August 19, 2006, 08:54:22 PM[/size][hr]Please someone [br][size=1]Posted at: August 20, 2006, 08:15:10 AM[/size][hr]ok, now when i click on runserver it works. I can log onto the server. but when i try to change something, like my player rights, levels, whats in the shops…ect. It wont work. I have to compile right? because i try to compile and i get errors… ill post the error in a minute[br][size=1]Posted at: August 20, 2006, 10:28:32 AM[/size][hr]The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with run&compile
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

That means it still works, it started the server.

Read full topic
